listingDescription: Find your new home in the community of Artavia by J. Patrick homes. Artavia is a vibrant community with many upscale amenities such as discovery ponds, meditation gardens, and more! This stunning new home has 4 bedrooms & 4.5 baths. With amenities such as a game room, media room and a four car garage, this home is a must-see! The gorgeous kitchen is complete with an island with a farmhouse style sink, bar seating, and all new appliances. Overlooking the kitchen is the spacious dining room which features stunning wooden floors. The spa-like master bath has his and hers sinks, a standing shower and a luxurious alcove tub. Other amenities of this home include large walk in closets, a gorgeous staircase, and an outdoor patio and kitchen. The Nan new home team can assist the J. Patrick client with seller assistant programs, and guaranteed buyout. We are here to make your home buying process as seamless as possible. Come experience for yourself what the community of Artavia has to offer!

Find yourself at home in this new construction 4 bedroom fortress! With its Meadowlark floorplan, you are given the absolute best space, perfect for large families and ready for move-in January 2020. This home includes a media room, game room, and a 4 car garage! Throughout the home, you’ll find tile, wood, and carpet flooring to compliment the beautiful finishes and light fixtures. Walking through the kitchen you’ll find nothing less than deluxe appliances and countertops. Burrowed in Harper’s Preserve, you will find the community offers amazing amenities for all families to enjoy such as a pool, playground, picnic area, and a scenic lake! J. Patrick Homes brings you this home. The community is zoned to Conroe ISD and offers easy access to major highways. Schedule a tour and make your way to this divine community to find your new forever home!
